  Misty

Frank Ratka <warrior18eii@...> wrote:
              There aren't many things I see eye to eye with AAEVP on in their research but this is one subject I do. Please feel free to read this article if you haven't already. Even if you have read it, read it again to remind yourself of the possibilities. I recommend this for both beginner and experienced experimenters.

http://www.aaevp.com/articles/articles_about_safety.htm

Regards,

Frank R.
